location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on paperDimensions:170 x 195 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Hand drawn sketch map of Kuwait-Iraq maritime frontier attached to a report to illustrate incident between Iraqi Customs Authorities and a Kuwaiti vessel near Bubiyan Island on 15th October 1933 (folios 116-120).Kuwait-Iraq frontier indicated by red dash-dot line with the actual and alleged position of the jolly boat marked.
